body.name: Phone Tripod, Lusweimi 44-inch iPhone Tripod with Phone Holder Mount/Wireless Remote for Cell Phone/Camera/Webcam/GoPro, Tabletop Lightweight Tripod for iOS/Android/Smartphone
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 46 mins
features: 【Adjustable Lightweight Tripod】: Our tripod is adjustable,could be extended from 12.9 inches to 42 inches (33 - 106cm) . Of compact and lightweight design, only weight 0.7 lbs (0.32kg), easily fit in small backpack. This excellent tripod would definitely help you to capture the highlight moments of your life, and you could take group photos with family and friends happily during the travels.

【Upgraded Remote Control】: Using the 5th generation of latest Wireless technology, our wireless remote control is widely compatible with all iPhone series, Android cellphones like Samsung, Huawei and etc. Effective distance is up to 8m (26.2 ft).Taking selfies in the course of the journey will become much easier.

【3-Way Tripod Head】: 3-way head provides 360°horizontal and 90° vertical rotation, which allows you to take shots in any angle which you desired. And with standard 1/4” screw, which means it is suitable for Cellphone holder/Mirrorless Cameras/ Gopro. You can record the happy moments in your life.

【Compatibility & Accessories】: Comes with universal phone mount which is compatible with iPhone 13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/iPhone 12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/iPhone 11/11 Pro/XS Max/XS/XR/X/8/8 plus/ Galaxy Note 9/Note 8/S10 and Wireless remote control. Portable carrying bag is also included. Phone holder is extendable from 55 to 90 mm, compatible with most phones in the market such as iPhone/Samsung/Huawei.

【Dependable Stability】: The combination of non-slip rubber legs and triangular construction makes tripod more stable. It could hold up more weight up to 3.33lbs (1.5kg), strong enough to hold the Cellphone/Mirrorless Camera.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 148 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This includes everything you need in a lightweight affordable package
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this adjustable lightweight tripod, and it has exceeded my expectations. Its appearance is a smooth aluminum and matte black features. The tripod is incredibly versatile, offering a range from 12.9 inches to 44 inches, making it perfect for capturing those highlight moments during my travels. It's also impressively lightweight at only 0.7 lbs, so it's a breeze to carry in my backpack.The upgraded remote control with the latest wireless technology is compatible with my iPhone and Android devices, providing a significant range of up to 8 meters. Selfies and group photos have become a breeze.The 3-way tripod head allows for 360° horizontal and 90° vertical rotation, making it easy to capture shots. Its compatibility with cell phone holders, mirrorless cameras, and GoPros is a huge plus. I can now record all those happy moments with my device of choice.The tripod's stability is impressive. The non-slip rubber legs and adjustable triangular construction ensure a solid base, capable of holding up to 3.33 lbs. This tripod has been a fantastic addition to my photography gear, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and versatile tripod for their travels. Plus, the included portable carrying bag is a great bonus so nothing gets misplaced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for doing phone lives
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I use this product to make make up videos and it is really great to put on my desk… It is a little flimsy and not super sturdy but I love how compact it is

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used with my iPhone 14 promax Super easy and gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together and does exactly what I need. I like that it has a little level to ensure the camera is held straight. I plan to use this tripod as my regular go to for filming content I create. Also worked great with my partner’s Samsung galaxy s9+. I’m able to get just the camera angle I need thanks to this lightweight tripod, super convenient for all my needs! Loved that it came with a Bluetooth compatible remote as well that worked great with my phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lightweight and sturdy tripod with smartphone holder
reviews.reviewText: I thought the wrong item was delivered because there is nothing on the box showing the phone holder. I was thrilled to see that it was inside, along with the remote.The tripod is adjustable in every way someone should want. It opens out to over 33" (85cm) tall then mounting pad extends up to make it about 40.5" (105cm). Closing the legs in to use this as a monopod brings the height of the camera pad to 42.5" (108cm). The only way I can see this being as long as advertised it by rotating the handle to point up, but this would point the camera at the ground.Anyway, I do not need a tall tripod. This one is tall and sturdy enough for me.The cross supports are plastic but they do their job. I imagine this keeps the weight low too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars its not shake, but is weak
reviews.reviewText: its not shake, good for lazer, but is weak

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super value for money
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. To be honest, I spent 3 months looking for a really good tripod for my videos. I bought many and returned them because they were bad quality and were so expensive. Now, what I really like about this product is its value. It's so cheap and the quality is amazing. It works really well and I can my videos so much more easily. Very portable because is so light. I strongly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not sure how long it will last.
reviews.reviewText: This thing is as advertised with a lot of add-ons and so on. The wireless remote works perfectly when connected to my Samsung Galaxy and Motorola Stylus G. I have no iPhone and so can't say how well it works on that platform. The remote has only one button, unlike others that have one for Apple and one for Android, making it easier to use. The biggest problem with this thing is that it is FLIMSY! OMG! I have no doubt that it will be able to support my devices, but I have no idea how long this thing will last, after being taken around and no doubt falling over a few times. This is not a quality piece at all. I kinda regret buying it, but I don't envision using it a lot and will probably get what I pay for in the end. I can't recommend it, to be honest, because it is just a really bad design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well for light use
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for periodic video calls with my parents, and it works very well for that purpose. The piece as a whole is relatively light and probably unsuited to being used outside if there's any wind, but it's just fine for setting up and holding a phone indoors for a sustained period.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great value for this little tripod!
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed with this little tripod! For indoor use it would work a treat. It was easily adjustable, had a nice height range and seemed very stable. It held my tiny SE perfectly as well as a friend's 14 equally well. I did not try the remote, so I cannot speak for how well it works. But I think it's great value for the money. I did return it, but only because I needed and overhead mount and failed to realize this was the wrong tool for that. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase again, however if I was looking for a traditional tripod for my phone.
My LG Velvet didn't fit not what I thought it was.
If a good gust of wind comes this is falling over. Feels weak
